entity.name: Amy McGrath
entity.description: Candidate for Representative from Kentucky, Amy McGrath

text:
It's no surprise that McConnell inserted a $90 billion provision in the coronavirus package giving even more tax breaks to people making over a MILLION dollars a year.

Mitch will do anything for his rich friends but leaves regular Kentuckians high and dry.https://t.co/VnXAr5a12u
